Your draft is a solid first pass but needs tightening, deeper causal logic, and tighter source‑linking to meet the 3–6‑month horizon and scenario‑map requirements. 1) **Structure**: Break the piece into clear sections—Macro backdrop, UAS labor market, Dividend play, Inghams, Toyota RAV4, Scenario map, Base case, Alt scenarios, Risks, Watch list, Confidence. 2) **Causal chain**: Explicitly show how Fed policy → discount rates → dividend valuations; Implement these edits to elevate the analysis to world‑class quality.
